text: Hey Y’all, were attempting to hire a solutions producer/outreach strategist/client consultant bout Martech kinda person.  If you are interested, or  if you know someone in your network who is interested please let me know!  We’re helping some of the most progressive organizations in the United States have more impact and reach more people.  (Movement for Black Lives, Washington Center for Equitable Growth, Urban Institute’s Workrise, Resonance Network, etc, etc)   Any leads on a strategist would really help us out! Job Description here: <https://parsonstko.com/want-to-work-with-us/consultant-roles/>
